alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nassau, north central Duval and south central Camden Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yulee, or 7 miles north of Jacksonville International Arpt, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland and Yulee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Western Duval
